author: Staff Reporter
text:
Applications have been invited for the Tamil Nadu government’s “Avvaiyar Award” for 2015-2016. The award is presented to a person for exceptional service for the development of women on the occasion of International Women’s Day.

Collector A. Gnanasekaran, in a press release said, persons born in Tamil Nadu and aged above 18 years can apply for the award.

Should be involved in

social activities

The persons should have been involved in social welfare activities and promote women development through language, art, culture and science.

The award will be presented by the Chief Minister and it carries a cash prize, gold medal and a citation.

Eligible candidates in Tiruvannamalai district can approach the District Social Welfare office located on the Collector office premises for further details, the release said.
title: Applications invited for Avvaiyar award
